alert.note: Alert for Kanabec (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 27 at 4:48PM CDT until July 27 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN KANABEC COUNTY... At 448 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Quamba, or 14 miles west of Hinckley, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Snake River State Forest and Warman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
